name: ToyamaWizHomII
0:
”Alexa, turn on living room light 1”
”Alexa, Set dimmer brightness to fifty percent”
”Alexa, set the living room fan speed to 50”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Have a complete control of the Toyama ecosystem with your voice for utmost comfort. 
With this skill, you can control your :
- Lights
- Fans
- Curtains
- Dimmers
- Scenes

Grouping them in the Alexa app allows you to control multiple devices and automate their behavior.
For example, you can have a certain set of lights turn off/on at a certain time every day. 

Please note, this requires preexisting Toyama devices that have been setup (sold separately) via the Toyama WizHom II app.
